splash.description: TrustPro is a public adjusting firm that works with your insurance company to get you a fair settlement. We are ready to handle all of your residential, business, and commerical property insurance loss claims. We're only compensated when you get the settlement you deserve.
splash.footerText: Insurance companies are well-represented, and you should be too!

boxes.description: Every claim is unique- tell us a little more about your situation and we'll develop a plan to get you the settlement you deserve.

boxes.title: Connect with Us
boxes.description: Communication and education are key parts of our approach. Our licensed public adjusters will provide personal service from the free claim review through the entire settlement process.

boxes.title: Receive Your Settlement

claimTypes.description: TrustPro adjusters are experienced in all facets of residential and commercial insurance losses.

residentialSplash.heading: Claims take time. Or, you can hire us.
residentialSplash.paragraph: When disaster strikes, we get you the settlement you deserve so you can get back to the things that matter most.

residentialSecondary.heading: Residential Claims
residentialSecondary.paragraph: It's frustrating to read your policy and deal with insurance companies. Their business model is designed to confuse and minimize the claims they pay. That's where TrustPro comes in: Our public adjusters negotiate all claims for fire, water, storm, and other damages. We focus on personal service to you and your family, we've seen a thing or two, so we know a thing or two.

contentOne.heading: It Starts With Your Free Claim Review
contentOne.paragraphOne: TrustPro licensed public adjusters will reach out to discuss your claim in detail.
contentOne.paragraphTwo: We will review your policy and documents to confirm coverage for your damages. Assesing current scope value and verifying supporting evidence in order to promote a fair settlement for you and your family.

contentTwo.heading: We Handle Insurance Companies, So You Don't Have To
contentTwo.paragraphOne: Homeowners often find negotiations frustratingâ€“ the process can drag on for months or years if mishandled. Most policyholders make the mistake of trusting their insurance company's initial assessment.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: TrustPro negotiates directly with your insurance company to reach a fair settlement, restoring your property's value and providing you with piece of mind.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: After reaching a settlement, we ensure accurate and prompt payment by processing the funding through iink Payments -  a quick and secure way to transfer funds.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: Allowing TrustPro to guide you through our systematic claim process guarantees a fair and accurate settlement based upon the coverage provided in your policy and the damages sustained to your property. And remember, we only get paid when you do!

commercialSplash.heading: Business as usual. Until it's not.
commercialSplash.paragraph: People rely on you, and you rely on your insurance company. We expedite a fair settlement so you can get back to business.

commercialSecondary.heading: Commercial Claims
commercialSecondary.paragraph: Your business suffered a loss, distracting you from what you do best- running your business and making money. Your time is valuable, so put TrustPro public adjusters to work to settle your claim and get you back to business.

contentOne.heading: Our Commercial Property Process
contentOne.paragraphOne: Your business loss generated a lot of paperwork. Angry tenants, grumpy contractors, and unscrupulous insurance adjusters delay the recovery process, adding to the headache. Let TrustPro commercial public adjusters take the reins. Our close attention to detail and commercial expertise help streamline claim resolution.

contentTwo.heading: Submission & Negotiation
contentTwo.paragraphOne: After a thorough review of your claim has been completed, an estimate package is prepared to account for all damages and entitlements. This comprehensive estimate package is designed to capture the whole story, assuring no underlying damages are overlooked. Our estimate effectively serves as a roadmap to your claim resolution. Let us focus on your business' recovery, while you focus on the business itself.

contentThree.heading: Settlement
contentThree.paragraphOne: The settlement phase is the most eagerly anticipated part of the process. Oftentimes, insurance companies will try to rush a settlement to undermine the extent of your damages. TrustPro protects your best interests, ensuring a fair and accurate settlement.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: TrustPro processes the funding of your settlement to ensure accurate and prompt payment according to the terms of your policy. And remember, we don't get paid unless you do!

contractorSplash.heading: Relationships Matter
contractorSplash.paragraph: Contractors are some of our closest friends. And friends don't let friends negotiate with insurance companies.

contractorSecondary.heading: Contractors & Associations
contractorSecondary.paragraph: Contractors and Property Associations can rely on TrustPro to negotiate fair settlements for their clients and insureds. Your insurance policies and claims are complex and require attention to detail that only TrustPro can provide. Let us fight for you and take one more thing off your plate. Then, let's grab lunch.

contentOne.heading: Contractors
contentOne.paragraphOne: You are experts at restoration and renovation- with a deep understanding of construction, material costs, labor, and project timelines. At TrustPro, we are experts in dealing with insurance companies- with a deep understanding of policies, negotiating strategies, and fair settlements. Together, we create a synergy with the client's best interest at heart, making them whole again.

contentTwo.heading: HOA, COA, & POA
contentTwo.paragraphOne: TrustPro ensures homeowner associations, condo associations, and property owner associations are well-represented, just like the insurance companies. You encounter unique hurdles when handling insurance claims- from navigating complex policies to understanding the rights of unit owners, and the claims process can be daunting.
contentTwo.paragraphTwo: Often, oversights or errors are made by those trying their best, resulting in undervalued claims, extended settlement durations, and issues with neighbors. TrustPro specializes in handling it all for you- providing clarity and direction to ensure your community gets the swift and fair settlement it deserves.

contentThree.heading: Affiliations
contentThree.paragraphOne: TrustPro uses iink payment processing to manage all settlements, eliminating delays and streamlining your payments. Our commitment to a seamless, secure, and efficient payment ensures your payment is hassle-free and timely, leading to a quicker restoration process.
contentThree.paragraphTwo: TrustPro is excited to join United Claims Professionals (UCP), the newest organization for public adjusters and industry experts. Our affiliation with UCP signifies our dedication to upholding the highest standards of professionalism. The relationship bolsters our ability to provide top-notch services and demonstrate our commitment to you, the insured.

whoWeAre.heading: Who We Are
whoWeAre._comment (internal use only): The paragraphs below are completely dynamic, this means that you add or remove any of the paragraphs and the page will handle it automatically.
paragraphs: TrustPro is a family-owned and operated business serving the communities of North Carolina and South Carolina. Our founders grew up in the contracting, roofing, and public adjusting space, spending over a decade witnessing what damage and disappointment do to families and businesses.

Insurance companies always have the best negotiators and take advantage of every situation to minimize the claims they pay. So, who advocates for families and businesses? We learned about public adjusters and their role in processing and settling claims for the insured, and our mission became clear. TrustPro was founded to help families and businesses stand up to insurance companies and spread the word about public adjusters.

TrustPro staff understand and navigate the complex claims process, so you don't have to. We ensure our clients receive the compensation they deserve with transparency and communication- hallmarks of our firm. We work closely with clients to understand their unique circumstances, provide the personal attention they deserve, and ensure a fair and accurate settlement.

Thank you for trusting TrustPro with your residential and commercial insurance claims. We look forward to meeting you, advocating for you, and getting you the settlement you deserve so life can return to the way it was.
